ItemEffect.RecoveryKit:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="5e2e5533d484495b86447908f4a14d09" Scale="1"/]This lifesaving item will protect you from
getting knocked out! Plus, it detects
your low HP and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]automatically heals [System:Color name="Default"]you.
ItemEffect.DogFood:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="35f949f314954b339d4a74f3cb523d2e" Scale="1"/]When [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is injured, this will [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]heal him
instantly[System:Color name="Default"]! When he's in perfect health,
it will temporarily [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]increase his HP[System:Color name="Default"]!
ItemEffect.YuudouEsa:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="4eac3f8791fd42cf9eff5be16f4f25bd" Scale="1"/]These handpicked carrots have a
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]paralyzing effect when eaten[System:Color name="Default"]! Perfect
for [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]stopping [System:Color name="Default"]and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]baiting [System:Color name="Default"]creatures!
ItemEffect.SensorBomb:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="3a3d958613dc4f31b1d2e9338f36cf71" Scale="1"/]When this bomb [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]senses the movement [System:Color name="Default"]of
a creature, it explodes! Kee-hee! You can
even stick it to those pesky creatures!
ItemEffect.Bomb:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="b72868ddcdb742818c3e644fd3579d9f" Scale="1"/]Made from all-natural, organic materials,
these bombs are strong enough to
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]destroy [System:Color name="Default"]reinforced walls. Intrigued?!
ItemEffect.HomingBomb:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="106c20e94c9248ef8b9347639648d269" Scale="1"/]A bomb that always [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]tracks[System:Color name="Default"] its prey and
never loses it. In the wild, I'd much rather
be the chaser than the chasee.
ItemEffect.IceBomb:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="3e444a38aa8e403c9cdf5b7acf9a5dec" Scale="1"/]When this bomb explodes, it saps away
all warmth from its surroundings. It can
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]freeze [System:Color name="Default"]creatures and water immediately!
ItemEffect.ThunderAll:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="5f8154f1c9724f42998af73ca58e25c4" Scale="1"/]This powerful lightning strike briefly
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]immobilizes [System:Color name="Default"]creatures! Don't worry—its
design won't allow it to zap its user.
ItemEffect.Bag_GekikaraBeforeUse:
[UE:Meta key="00ba33994c814733bd002e104617c6d3" Scale="1"/]A spray consisting of red nectar infused with [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ultra-spicy
compounds[System:Color name="Default"]. Side effects still unknown.
ItemEffect.Bag_Gekikara:
[UE:Meta key="bd1414bbe3e24b5687cf620060f57be9" Scale="1"/]This spray [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]increases the overall speed[System:Color name="Default"] of Pikmin and [Carrot:DogName/].
It affects everyone in the vicinity for a limited period of time.
ItemEffect.Bag_Tsuyu:
[UE:Meta key="cf08313e765c4e1cab34811be673da54" Scale="1"/]A red Ultra-Spicy Berry known to have a lot of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ultra-spicy
compounds[System:Color name="Default"]. Ten berries will produce one bottle of spray.
ItemEffect.Bag_RecoveryKit:
[UE:Meta key="67914620560b4375806792f084c15351" Scale="1"/]A lifesaving tool that automatically [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]replenishes [System:Color name="Default"]your HP when
you get knocked out. Can be used to recover HP when low.
ItemEffect.Bag_DogFood:
[UE:Meta key="b6a1ef5d61024fa39b6242fb3eab1eac" Scale="1"/]A favorite snack that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]completely reenergizes [System:Color name="Default"][Carrot:DogName/].
Eating one when at full health leads to a hefty [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]HP increase[System:Color name="Default"].
ItemEffect.Bag_YuudouEsa:
[UE:Meta key="73bc32b39f164a7ea49861427d8c1a6a" Scale="1"/]Carrots specifically picked for their extremely
bitter taste. So bitter, in fact, that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]they paralyze
[System:Color name="Default"]the creatures that are tempted to eat them.
ItemEffect.Bag_SensorBomb:
[UE:Meta key="d0c1141cdc2e4feaabde374570e3f58b" Scale="1"/]A bomb that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]reacts to the movements [System:Color name="Default"]of living creatures
and explodes. It can also be stuck to a creature's body.
ItemEffect.Bag_Bomb:
[UE:Meta key="95ed404bb2b2474b89a75014dbbc15f4" Scale="1"/]A bomb that results in [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]huge damage [System:Color name="Default"]to creatures.
It can also destroy dirt walls and reinforced walls.
ItemEffect.Bag_HomingBomb:
[UE:Meta key="88aa771c49e643599380e2ccafa21a37" Scale="1"/]A [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]tracking bomb [System:Color name="Default"]that won't let its target or prey get away.
Creatures rarely escape this bomb, even if they run around.
ItemEffect.Bag_IceBomb:
[UE:Meta key="4b5f7df403bd449386219a451e7e9fa2" Scale="1"/]This [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]freezing bomb [System:Color name="Default"]will sap away any warmth in the area when
it detonates. It can also freeze creatures and bodies of water.
ItemEffect.Bag_ThunderAll:
[UE:Meta key="1c40c8770ce24eb4a1a7b48c05486a02" Scale="1"/]A lightning strike that electrocutes creatures
in the area and momentarily [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]paralyzes [System:Color name="Default"]them.
ItemEffect.Bag_PhotonBall:
[UE:Meta key="20afce36bf8545b4bbfdee61a2afacb2" Scale="1"/]A mysterious seed that produces [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Glow Pikmin [System:Color name="Default"]when thrown.
Used only during night expeditions and when underground.
ItemEffect.RecoveryKit_Sample:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="41f65481bfef44afb7ec5280b5554451" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]This lifesaving kit [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]auto-replenishes[System:Color name="Default"] your
HP![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You should always keep one equipped.
Then you can focus on rescuing!
ItemEffect.DogFood_Sample:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="6898f9e57a9a4bf09089299a7c527620" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]It's a superfood that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]replenishes [System:Color name="Default"][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s
HP![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Give him lots of these and even more
belly rubs.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's the least you can do!
ItemEffect.YuudouEsa_Sample:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="8ade9b27c44d4ea5b8ec0f4dae691792" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Toss one of these crunchies to a creature,
and watch its bitter flavor [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]paralyze them
[System:Color name="Default"]from head to toe...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]or tail.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ade9b27c44d4ea5b8ec0f4dae691792" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]There are plenty of Pikpik Carrots in the
pantry, but some are [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]duds [System:Color name="Default"]and way too
bitter to be considered edible.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ade9b27c44d4ea5b8ec0f4dae691792" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]By us, anyway! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="15"/] But the more you
feed to the creatures, the longer they'll
stay out of your way.
ItemEffect.SensorBomb_Sample:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="171ce835270746b4903dd9081c5b8b76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]It's a bomb that explodes when it [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]detects
motion [System:Color name="Default"]from living things![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Plus, it's kinda
sticky![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Try attaching one to a creature.
ItemEffect.Bomb_Sample:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="695aa5dc5d6b4c35b9835a7787de42dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]A bomb so powerful it can even [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]destroy
[System:Color name="Default"]reinforced walls![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just be careful to not
get caught in the blast zone.
ItemEffect.HomingBomb_Sample:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="467aea881a064f8aac1d3c492b805713" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]This bomb can automatically [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]track and
chase [System:Color name="Default"]its target![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Perfect for use on
particularly fast creatures.
ItemEffect.IceBomb_Sample:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="d0a67a957128430686224aa9f687feb8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]This bomb saps heat from surrounding
areas instantly and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]freezes [System:Color name="Default"]everything
nearby.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Creatures and water included!
ItemEffect.ThunderAll_Sample:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="6e1d5729db1b4d82bbba46f09a32deb0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Use the electrifying power of science to
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]electrocute [System:Color name="Default"]all creatures in the area![etc:Wait frame="15"/] For
use in a pinch—but watch the timing!
